queries.query:
from(bucket: "iot")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["channel"] == "health")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "payload_version")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "iot")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["channel"] == "health")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "settings_version")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iot")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["channel"] == "health")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bcm_temp")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iot")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["channel"] == "health")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "reboots")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iot")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["channel"] == "door")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "iot")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["channel"] == "panic")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
